items.sentence: My wife did not attend the party and neither did I.
Please think it over and let me know your decision.
When did you realize that Tom didn\'t like it here?
Tom and Mary said they had to work some things out.
Tom ate a piece of toast and drank a cup of coffee.
I don\'t even know what\'s happening to me anymore.
I thought Tom was the best singer on stage tonight.
I thought Tom would want to try some Japanese food.
I thought for a second that Tom was going to faint.
I thought we could go out and get something to eat.
I wish I could play the guitar as well as Tom does.
I wish I could speak French half as well as you do.
I wish I had asked Tom for advice before I started.
I wish I had enough money to buy a house like that.
Tom needs someone he can discuss his problems with.
Tom never allowed Mary to see what was in his safe.
Tom offered to feed my cat while I was out of town.
Tom ordered beer for himself and red wine for Mary.
Tom said he didn\'t want to go to the park with us.
Why do you think Tom prefers living in the country?
